title: Hogwarts Legacy
text: We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted at Hogwarts School of
Witchcraft and Wizardry as a fifth-year student.
Preliminary supplies have been collected for you and will accompany you on your
As you may be aware, the Decree for the Reasonable Restriction of Underage
Sorcery prohibits the use of magic by those under the age of seventeen outside
school. However, due to your unique circumstances, the Ministry has graciously
agreed to allow Professor Eleazar Fig to help you hone your spell-casting before
escorting you from London to the castle for the start-of-term deast and the Sorting
